thread.title: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral
thread.title_full: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral

author: Mark Molloy
title: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral
text:
T he heartwarming story behind a Canadian teenagerâ€™s selfie with an elderly woman she met in a casino bathroom has touched internet hearts.
Mahri Smith , from Ottawa, was taking some selfies with her friends when the woman explained how much she missed dressing up to go out with her friends when she was younger.
T he 18-year-old posted the photos and the story behind them on social media, with more than 300,000 people liking and sharing the post.
â€œThis lady in the washroom looking at me said, â€˜I remember when my girlfriends and I would get dressed up and go out, I miss thatâ€™,â€ she wrote.
â€œSo I said, â€˜Why miss it, we are all out right now arenâ€™t we? Short story, we have a new friend.â€

Another added: â€œThe world needs more people like you.â€
In an interview with CTV News Ottawa , Ms Smith added: â€œI told her â€˜weâ€™re all here- you are our girlfriendâ€™. So she came in for the pictures and she was more photogenic than us, she was loving it, and it was just so much fun.â€
â€œI just saw the picture and it made me smile, and I was thinking â€˜oh my girlfriends will love thisâ€™.â€
Her friend Morgan Sheppard added: â€œIt would be really nice to track this lady down and get to know her, and let her know, â€˜look youâ€™re internet famous nowâ€™.â€
L ast year, this teenager's kind act for a scared elderly woman also won internet hearts.
